title: From hugs to spats: key moments from the Democratic debate – video
text: A dozen candidates crammed the stage in the electoral battleground state of Ohio, as the Democrats race to pick a challenger to Donald Trump in the November 2020 election. The debate comes at a critical time, as the former vice-president Joe Biden has seen his once solid lead in opinion polls diminished by Elizabeth Warren, a leader of the party's progressive movement. At the first debate since Democrats in Congress launched impeachment proceedings against Trump, the candidates defended the inquiry and said the president needed to be held accountable for his actions and for stonewalling Congress
description: A dozen candidates crammed the debate stage as the Democrats race to pick a challenger to Donald Trump in the 2020 election
